author: Gerald F. Seib
title: What the Shutdown Says About U.S. Politics in 2018
text:
Most people, inside Washington and out, donâ€™t want the government to shut down. And a majority of people, inside Washington and out, want to find a way to help the Dreamers, the immigrants brought to the U.S. illegally when they were children.
Yet the government has shut down because of a dispute over the Dreamers. How does this kind of thing happen?
